outputs.output_descr:
·	Promotion of an integrated systems development and systems thinking approach to conducting business within government and in the implementation of development programmes as stated in the Provincial Growth and Development Strategies (PGDS) and Integrated Development Plans (IDPs) 
·	Poverty reduction strategies/plans at sub-national level linked to the MDGs and incorporating crosscutting issues such as gender, environment, HIV/AIDS and human rights issues.
·	Institutionalization of all programme components within government structures at provincial level and strengthening of leadership to implement, monitor and evaluate
